properties.areaDesc: Grant, AR; Lonoke, AR; Hot Spring, AR; Saline, AR; Pulaski, AR; Jefferson, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 12:14AM CST until January 11 at 12:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
At 1214 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Jacksonville to near Ironton to near Cane Creek
to near Sheridan, moving east at 40 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

Locations impacted include...
Little Rock...                    North Little Rock...
Sherwood...                       Jacksonville...
West Little Rock...               Maumelle...
Bryant...                         Downtown Little Rock...
Sheridan...                       North Little Rock Airport...
Southwest Little Rock...          Shannon Hills...
Wrightsville...                   Argenta...
Redfield...                       Tull...
Prattsville...                    Poyen...
Otter Creek...                    Cane Creek...

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 30 between mile markers 126 and 142.
Interstate 40 between mile markers 143 and 167.
Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 12.
Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 21.
Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 7.
Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 14.
US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 9.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central,
southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and flash
flooding may occur. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.

NWSheadline: A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL LONOKE...NORTHERN GRANT...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON... SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...EASTERN HOT SPRING AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES
